contest-event.event-date:
May 4, 1975 D Trans Pennine (Greenfield) Band Contest (Section B)
Trans Pennine (Greenfield) Band Contest (Section B) 20 Test Piece Contest Trans Pennine (Greenfield) Band Contest trans-pennine-greenfield-band-contest-section-b
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Civic Hall, Uppermill rizes - 1st £40 and trophy, 2nd £25, 3rd £20. 6th annual contest. 6 bands competed.
Nov. 27, 2014, 12:50 p.m. Dec. 17, 2016, 10:45 a.m.
1 Marsden Silver Prize Band Herbert H. Howarth Labour and Love
2 Wakefield Youth Peter Kitson Suite Gothique
3 Dobcross Silver Band Peter Weston
Unknown Result Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band David Hirst Lorenzo
Unknown Result Yeadon Old Band Vernon Cuff Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals
Unknown Result Yorkshire Traction Edward Griffiths A Moorside Suite
